text:
Hi folks,
I am trying to add a personal AccessKey to my local development, but the scopes `cms.functions.read` and `cms.functions.write` are not being shown. I tried to deactivate and activate the token but no luck.
Anybody knows what is happening?

On my sandbox account (DEV) I have both `cms.functions.read` and `cms.functions.write` .
Whereas on my production account (PROD) the scopes are missing.

Just got this error when tried to upload:
```Folder name cannot end with .functions. This account or user does not have access to serverless functions```
Will follow up when I figure it out! As my account is set as super-admin
Same thing when I try to create an app
